title: Exercises in plotting WDI data
contents:
Load it up!


library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(WDI)

df <- WDI(country = c("PH","VN"),
          indicator = "NY.GDP.PCAP.KD",
          start = 1990)


Plot it!


plot <- ggplot(df, aes(x = year, y = NY.GDP.PCAP.KD, color = country)) +
  geom_line()

plot

title: Two Points Make a Line
description:
Welcome to our new blog, Two Points Make a Line. We hope you enjoy 
reading what we have to say!
